content.html: Web3 isn't decentralized. In the "real internet" we have now, things are decentralized and actors can simply talk to each other. Web3 introduces centralized bottlenecks ("blockchains") and forces you to buy access to the central resource in order to communicate
content.value: Web3 isn't decentralized. In the "real internet" we have now, things are decentralized and actors can simply talk to each other. Web3 introduces centralized bottlenecks ("blockchains") and forces you to buy access to the central resource in order to communicate
